name: Police Simulator
description:
Enter a Virtual Vaporwave - Bladerunner - Noir World as a police officer on the chase to catch some criminals!

Use the gun & weapon soundboard or listen to the police radio while pranking your friends or foes with the classic police siren!

Unlock the SWAT Pack to use many other features every cop needs: Unlock neon colours for your taser / stun gun. Rig the lie detector to prank your friends and activate rain sounds while you cruise through the city in your vaporwave police car on a police chase through the traffic. Unlock the AK47 and Sniper gun to get those robbers!

Features:

- Scan your friends finger in the Lie Detector / Finger Scanner to check if the say the truth or lie. You’ll love it!
- Use the weapon soundboard to hear the sounds of a Pistol, Revolver, AK47 or a sniper rifle! Get all the firearms & SFX!
- Activate the Police Emergency Sirens on the perpetual Vaporwave Police Car Chase or the Radio Simulator to listen to your fellow cops!
- Stop Crime with the all new Neon Taser Stun Gun & put those criminals into prison and jail. And keep on driving on the autobahn!
